note:
Biologist & educator in the Netherlands. I've got a column somewhere but I'll never tell. I like (palaeo)botany, anthropology, free & open software, Chinese tea and old hifi tech. He/him.

Profile picture: the face of lieutenant commander Data, laughing on a background of fern fronds.

Header image: to the right, a tree trunk, top and bottom cut off by the frame, with a small leafy bough sprouting from it. The rest of the image contains verdant trees and shrubs, backlit by the setting sun.

From the river to the sea, Palestine will be free!
